thread.title: Jennifer Lopez Talks Drake and Dating Younger Men on The Ellen Show
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez Talks Drake and Dating Younger Men on The Ellen Show

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Jennifer Lopez Talks Drake and Dating Younger Men on The Ellen Show
text:
If anyone can get a celebrity to tell the truth about a rumored relationship, it's Ellen DeGeneres. Her latest victim? Jennifer Lopez. While asking whom she spent Valentine's Day with, the talk show host showed this famous photo of her with Drake taken last December . "This guy right here? Was it this guy?" Ellen asked.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
J.Lo, who did break her silence on their "relationship" on the Grammys red carpet , stuck to her same story. "We did a song together, if that's what you're asking," she said, "We're just hanging out. He sent me a song that he wanted me to be on. And then I got on the song. I don't know what he's going to do with it, but yeah."
Not a totally satisfying response, but Ellen did pry a little more about the rumor that J.Lo likes to date younger men.
"OK, first of all, stop . I don't date younger men," she responded, "It's not like you have to be younger. It's not about that. I just meet people. And, if I go out with them, I go out with them, and I like them, I like them. If I don't, I don't. I just — it's about the person, you know what I mean? It's about who they are. It has nothing to do with age."
J.Lo previously dated Beau Casper Smart, who is 18 years younger.
"There's this thing because I dated Beau and he was younger, and that was the first guy I ever dated who was younger then me," she said, "But, then I got labeled right away. And then, that was it. It's about whether or not I'm attracted to them or not. Attracted to their spirit, their soul, their energy, whatever–their body."
Watch the full interview below and skip to 3:22 for Ellen's interrogation about Drake — J.Lo's face says it all.
